body: Remembering 10 years since El Salvador began using the US Dollar as its currency, Tim from Tim's El Salvador Blog explains: "It would be fair to say that the move to the dollar has never been popular among the ordinary people of El Salvador."
original_body: Remembering 10 years since El Salvador began using the US Dollar as its currency, Tim from Tim's El Salvador Blog explains: "It would be fair to say that the move to the dollar has never been popular among the ordinary people of El Salvador."
title: El Salvador: 10 Years with the US Dollar
